授業目的:
Students will be introduced to a wide range of communication strategies at the basic level. The course will emphasize speaking, listening, reading, and writing.

The purpose of this course is for students to practice and improve speaking and listening fluency, communication skills, presentations skills, acquire vocabulary, and explore personal and social issues in society using English as a medium to communicate student ideas and opinions. The course will focus on the development of student communicative competency, vocabulary, grammar, listening, speaking, reading, critical thinking, comprehension, writing, and discussion. The course will be conducted in English.
到達目標: Using the textbook Time Zones 3A (Third Edition), students will be able to improve their English communication and conversation skills.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: We will be a face-to-face class. A face-to-face class format is defined as 50% of the course’s total contact hours are conducted in a face-to-face manner. Also, the number of people allowed in a classroom must be limited to half of its usual capacity. When activity restriction levels are 1 or 2, we'll be face-to-face. When activity restriction levels are 3 and higher, we'll be doing zoom simultaneous/two way online (in real time). Let’s try to have as many face-to-face classes as possible.
